params.pendingGov_: The address of the rebaser contract to use for authentication.

params.to: , the owner of the burn, the address that will receive the burn once completed

params.burn_id: , the ID of the burn to redeem.

burn(address,uint256).notice: Burns tokens, transfering tokens from msg.sender, burning them, adding an item to the burns list

deposit(uint256).notice: deposits native tokens into the contract

getBurns(address).notice: get all the burns of an account, the the full structs, ids, and if they can be redeemed.

govWithdraw(uint256).notice: withdraws native tokens into the contract

importData(address).notice: will be used if we ever need to make a new burn contract

redeem(uint256).notice: redeems a burn, claiming native FLIP back to "to"

totalPendingBurns().notice: the sum of all unredeemed burns in the contract
